extendedIngredients.aisle: Canned and Jarred;Milk, Eggs, Other Dairy
extendedIngredients.name: full-fat coconut milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 (14 oz/400 g) can full-fat coconut milk

extendedIngredients.name: unsweetened cocoa powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup (40 g) unsweetened cocoa powder, sifted

extendedIngredients.name: walnuts
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ cup (30 g) finely chopped walnuts

recipes.title: Healthy Chocolate-Walnut Fudge
recipes.instructions: Line a large mini muffin pan with paper liners.Melt the creamed coconut and coconut milk together in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat.Continue heating the coconut mixture until fully melted, then whisk in the cocoa powder until fully incorporated and turn off the heat. Stir in all remaining ingredients.Fill each lined mini muffin well with about 1 tablespoons of the chocolate mixture and transfer to the fridge to chill completely.Once chilled, remove from the pan and store the candies in the fridge in an airtight container layered between parchment or wax paper for up to 1 month.

steps.step: Line a large mini muffin pan with paper liners.Melt the creamed coconut and coconut milk together in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat.Continue heating the coconut mixture until fully melted, then whisk in the cocoa powder until fully incorporated and turn off the heat. Stir in all remaining ingredients.Fill each lined mini muffin well with about 1 tablespoons of the chocolate mixture and transfer to the fridge to chill completely.Once chilled, remove from the pan and store the candies in the fridge in an airtight container layered between parchment or wax paper for up to 1 month.
